title: Input/Output
description: Working with input and output operations

problems.title: Basic Input
problems.description: Write a program that takes a name as input and prints a greeting.

problems.title: File Operations
problems.description: Write a program that reads a file and counts the number of lines.
problems.starter_code:
filename = input()
with open(filename) as f:
    print(len(f.readlines()))

problems.title: CSV Reader
problems.description: Write a program that reads a CSV file and outputs the number of rows and columns.
problems.starter_code:
import csv
filename = input()
with open(filename) as f:
    reader = csv.reader(f)
    data = list(reader)
    print(f'Rows: {len(data)}, Columns: {len(data[0]) if data else 0}')
